properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 11 at 3:36PM AKST until January 13 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very
difficult. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches are
expected. Visibility will be one quarter mile or less at
times. Snow will accumulate into large drifts. South winds
gusting to 55 mph.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Until noon Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Whiteout conditions in blowing snow are
occuring. Snow will accumulate into large drifts. The worst
conditions are expected in the Bering Strait. Conditions will
improve briefly this afternoon as snow diminishes. Conditions
will rapidly deteriorate this evening as more snow moves into
the area. The worst conditions are expected tonight and Sunday.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY
